overview: A businessman, a preacher, and a host of comic characters battle for spiritual control of a small mid-western town.  Bible carrying preacher, David Whitcomb battles stubborn businessman Phil Esteem and three bumbling and treacherous demons as they plaque a small midwestern church, catching the ear of certain members of the flock causing mayhem and confusionâ€¦  But who is really in charge? A warm and witty satire.
title: Whitcomb's War
